I have a secret love for penguins. Below you will find a scatterplot of three of the many species, as a sign of appreciation. ğŸ’“ğŸ§

import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
g = sns.FacetGrid(sns.load_dataset('penguins'), hue='species', height=3, aspect=3.5/1.5)
g.map(plt.scatter, 'bill_length_mm', 'bill_depth_mm').add_legend()
